relation: Yadier Molina walked. Runner on first with none out and Daniel Descalso due up.
Daniel Descalso sacrificed to pitcher, reached first on Javier Lopez's throwing error. Runners on first and second with none out and Jon Jay due up.
Jon Jay bunt ground into a fielder's choice, pitcher to third. Runners on first and second with one out and Ryan Theriot due up.
Ryan Theriot flied out to center. Runners on first and second and with two outs and Colby Rasmus due up.
Colby Rasmus struck out swinging to end the inning.
pageTitle: Friday, April 8, 2011 St. Louis Cardinals - San Francisco Giants Box Scores, Game Results & Summary - USATODAY.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {50467=Freddy Sanchez was intentionally walked to load the bases. That set up Rowand's long game-winning blast off Tallet (0-1) to avoid spoiling a celebratory day in which the Giants raised their 2010 World Series banner before the game., 49869=San Francisco, CA (Sports Network) - Aaron Rowand drilled a deep shot off the base of the left-center field fence to score the game-winning run in the 12th inning, as the defending World Series champion San Francisco Giants opened the home portion of the 2011 schedule in style with a 5-4 win over St. Louis.}
